hotels.name: Shinta Mani Mustang
hotels.desc: Himalayan luxury lodge designed by Bill Bensley, showcasing local textiles and materials, mountain vistas
hotels.longDesc: Visionary luxury resort high in Nepal's rugged Himalayas, curated by renowned designer Bill Bensley with locally-sourced materials and rich textiles for an immersive mountain experience.

hotels.name: The Dwarika's
hotels.desc: Luxury heritage hotel, traditional Newari architecture, ornate woodcarvings, serene courtyards
hotels.longDesc: A stunning heritage property showcasing authentic Newari craftsmanship with spacious rooms and excellent service. Perfect for families seeking cultural immersion with comfort and elegance.

hotels.name: Hotel Himalaya
hotels.desc: Boutique hotel, garden views, traditional Nepali decor, central location, family suites available
hotels.longDesc: Charming boutique hotel featuring traditional Nepali architecture and warm hospitality. Offers family-friendly amenities including a garden courtyard and spacious accommodation options.

hotels.name: Hotel Pokhara Grande
hotels.desc: Waterfront resort, lakeside views, swimming pool, adventure activity center, kids' programs
hotels.longDesc: Spectacular lakeside resort with panoramic mountain views and excellent family amenities. Features a pool, water sports activities, and professional kids' clubs for memorable adventures.

hotels.name: Kathmandu Guest House
hotels.desc: Budget-friendly guesthouse, cozy rooms, rooftop restaurant, local guides, backpacker community
hotels.longDesc: Popular budget accommodation with friendly staff and authentic local atmosphere. Great for families seeking value without sacrificing comfort, with knowledgeable staff for trip planning.

restaurants.name: New Fewa Restaurant
restaurants.desc: Lakeside dining, fresh fish dishes, mountain views, casual ambiance, vegetarian options
restaurants.longDesc: Charming waterfront restaurant offering fresh catch and traditional Nepali cuisine with stunning lake and mountain views. Perfect for families seeking authentic flavors in a relaxed setting.

restaurants.name: Kathmandu Chabad House
restaurants.desc: Fine dining, farm-to-table concept, modern Nepali cuisine, intimate setting, seasonal menus
restaurants.longDesc: Award-winning restaurant showcasing contemporary takes on traditional Nepali dishes with locally-sourced ingredients. Sophisticated yet welcoming atmosphere suitable for families celebrating special occasions.

restaurants.name: The Bakery Cafe Baneshwor
restaurants.desc: Cozy cafe, fresh pastries, organic coffee, home-baked goods, friendly staff, family-welcoming
restaurants.longDesc: Delightful neighborhood bakery serving exceptional pastries, fresh coffee, and light meals in a warm, family-friendly atmosphere. Ideal spot for leisurely breakfasts and afternoon treats.

restaurants.name: Nepali Chulo
restaurants.desc: Traditional Nepali restaurant, authentic recipes, clay cooking methods, rustic decor, local favorites
restaurants.longDesc: Authentic establishment featuring traditional Nepali recipes prepared using time-honored clay cooking techniques. Warm, inviting setting perfect for families wanting to experience genuine local cuisine.
restaurants.photoAttribution: Nepali Chulo Authentic Restaurant and Banquet
restaurants.address: Lazimpat , Behind Hotel Gangjong, Kathmandu 44600, Nepal

restaurants.name: Tukche Thakali Kitchen
restaurants.desc: Family-friendly Asian fusion with outdoor seating in Thamel

restaurants.name: Fire And Ice Pizzeria
restaurants.desc: Wood-fired pizza popular with families in Thamel district

restaurants.name: The Chimney Restaurant
restaurants.desc: Russian-European cuisine in cozy garden setting, Thamel
restaurants.address: Hotel Yak & Yeti, Durbar Marg, Kathmandu 44600, Nepal

restaurants.name: Busy Bee Cafe
restaurants.desc: Lakeside cafe with fresh pastries and playground views

restaurants.name: Moondance Restaurant & Bar
restaurants.desc: Lakeside restaurant with rooftop terrace and kids menu

restaurants.name: Caffe Concerto
restaurants.desc: Italian family dining with live music on Lakeside Road

restaurants.name: Fresh Elements Restaurant & Bar
restaurants.desc: Healthy lakeside cafe with smoothies and kid-friendly options

restaurants.name: Roadhouse Cafe
restaurants.desc: Family-friendly bistro with international menu in Thamel

restaurants.name: Boomerang Restaurant and Bar
restaurants.desc: German bakery and bistro with kid-friendly menu and mountain views

restaurants.name: Yangling Tibetan Restaurant
restaurants.desc: Family-run Tibetan restaurant near Boudhanath with momos and noodle soups

restaurants.name: Himalayan Java - Tridevi Thamel
restaurants.desc: Local coffee chain with stroller-friendly spaces and excellent pastries

restaurants.name: Bhojan Griha
restaurants.desc: Traditional Nepali restaurant in historic Kathmandu mansion with cultural performances
restaurants.address: Dilli Bazar Height Marg, Kathmandu 44600, Nepal

restaurants.name: Kaiser Caf√©
restaurants.desc: Garden cafe restaurant in Kathmandu serving continental and Nepali cuisine

restaurants.name: Dream Garden Restaurant & Bar
restaurants.desc: Peaceful garden cafe in central Kathmandu serving international cuisine

restaurants.name: Third Eye Restaurant
restaurants.desc: Indian and Nepali restaurant in Thamel, Kathmandu

experiences.name: Buddha Stupa
experiences.desc: UNESCO World Heritage site, ancient Buddhist stupa, sacred pilgrimage site, prayer flags, monastery views
experiences.longDesc: Magnificent ancient stupa surrounded by monasteries and prayer flags, offering spiritual atmosphere and cultural immersion. Families can explore surrounding shops and enjoy traditional Tibetan butter tea.

experiences.name: Pashupatinath Temple
experiences.desc: Sacred Hindu temple, ancient architecture, riverside setting, pilgrimage destination, cultural significance
experiences.longDesc: One of the holiest Hindu temples with intricate golden architecture overlooking the Bagmati River. Offers profound cultural experience while children enjoy exploring the sacred compound and riverside paths.

experiences.name: Phewa Lake
experiences.desc: Scenic alpine lake, boating opportunities, Annapurna views, lakeside walks, water activities
experiences.longDesc: Beautiful mountain lake ideal for family boating and scenic walks with spectacular Himalayan backdrop. Kids enjoy feeding fish and exploring lakeside paths while families capture stunning photographs.

experiences.name: National Museum of Nepal
experiences.desc: Comprehensive art and artifact collection, historical exhibits, ancient sculptures, educational displays
experiences.longDesc: Excellent museum showcasing Nepal's rich artistic and cultural heritage with well-organized exhibits spanning centuries. Engaging for families with interactive displays and knowledgeable staff.

kidFriendly.name: Central Zoo
kidFriendly.desc: Nepal's premier zoo, diverse wildlife, educational programs, family-friendly amenities, shaded walking areas
kidFriendly.longDesc: Engaging zoo featuring native Himalayan animals and exotic species in naturalistic habitats. Perfect family destination with educational signage, shaded pathways, and amenities for young children.

markets.name: Ason Bazar
markets.desc: Historic spice market, colorful stalls, traditional goods, street food vendors, authentic local atmosphere
markets.longDesc: Vibrant centuries-old market brimming with aromatic spices, traditional crafts, and street food. Families enjoy exploring narrow lanes, sampling local treats, and purchasing unique souvenirs.

a.name: Family First Steps in Nepal (8 Days)
a.description: A gentle introduction to the Himalayas designed for young families‚Äîlakeside tranquility in Pokhara, cultural discovery in Kathmandu, and a pace that honors naptime and wonder in equal measure.
